item.title: Getting Started with MERN Stack Part 1
item.author: kumar.alankar92@gmail.com (Alankar Kumar)
item.description: Hello! Web development has evolved a lot with recent updates to ECMA script specifications. For those who have heard the term MEAN Stack and are confused as to what does MERN mean. It is just React – R for the Angular – A in the stack, the rest being MongoDB, ExpressJS,NodeJS. We won’t dive into the pros and cons of React or it’s relative advantages and disadvantages to Angular, because that’s another level of opinionated cacophony of technology loyalists.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.author: kumar.alankar92@gmail.com (Alankar Kumar)
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: About me
item.author: kumar.alankar92@gmail.com (Alankar Kumar)
item.description: My name is Inigo Montoya. I have the following qualities: I rock a great mustache I’m extremely loyal to my family What else do you need? my history To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.
